metadata.title: CVE-2017-8782 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The readString function in util/read.c and util/old/read.c in libming 0.4.8allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a large file thatis mishandled by listswf, listaction, etc. This occurs because of aninteger overflow that leads to a memory allocation error.

criterions.comment: ming package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
